1.title: the first poem

11.content:
A midevil
story is to be told take
on your role as
a valiant knight
a heroic king
an evil ruler
or a jester
in this realm
11.title: midevil

choices: Storm through the gates to save the King
Or make a plan, a wiser thing
111.content:
Sworn to the king and to his land
With armor smeared and sword in hand,
Sir Mandrin galloped to the gate
While praying he was not too late.

The need to take the treacherous lives
Of all the wretched men inside
Engulfed his thoughts, a burning flood,
The need to kill. A lust for blood.
111.title: Traitors

choices: Find out the weight of an unlaiden swallow.
1111.content:
I pounce the door, of untrodden woe,
the king sat still, with tie and bow,
I could not resist an idiom so dire,
to swing from the rafters with my enemy's lire.
Black and blue the bruises fly,
without a wimper or even a cry.
I laugh at my unyielding skill,
of swinging crazily without a quill.
Sir Mandrin, Sir Mandrin, I yelled from off high,
with a pitch and a scream something caught my fly.
Groaning with a moan, I crumpled to the floor.
Realizing this was the wrong tower, the King was next door. Doh!
1111.title: Storm through the gates to save the King

choices: Ponder the average flying speed on an unlaiden swallow!
1112.content:
But Sir Mandrin stood ever so still,
to think of what one might will,
a blood bath of flaming feud,
or just perhaps, just perhaps,
a nice little stew.
Of potatoes and carrots,
or perhaps some beef,
a mighty stew of lamb,
could quench a hunger's thief.
Who needs to plunder and kill,
for a King dumb enough to squander his skill.
A knight such as I need not kill,
it would produce such a nasty pill.
Don't be mean, why should I
for I am Sir Mandrin,
just a puddnin pie!
1112.title: Or make a plan, a wiser thing

113.content:
An isolated area
I dwell
ruling the land
greedy for more.

I am confident
nothing will stop me
from my armies
to destroy everything.

What I do
I do with pride
boostful and envious
of those who don't
comply with me.
113.title: evil ruler

choices: Find a Kingdom with a better name.
Finish my wife's grocery list before my unraveling my evil plot.
Find out the weight of an unlaiden swallow.
1131.content:
Smolder I brew, my contriving plot.
Of gold and greed and ferver trot.
Never a man so bold as I,
to take a kingdom, the Kingdom of Nye?????
1131.title: My Evil Plot

choices: Call Better Homes and Evil Henchmen
Find out the weight of an unlaiden swallow.
1132.content:
I sit and plot over my next caniving move,
as bold as ever they would say his groove.
Sitting here over my easy chair,
the heaps of bones pile high in the air.
Witches and pirates I have at my call,
if only my wife would get off that damn phone!!!!
1132.title: My Lair

choices: Ok never sharing next to last square.
Finding out the weight of an unlaiden swallow.
1133.content:
1. Getting on Evil Emperor's Weekly
2. Never showing my goodside
3. And never sharing my square of T.P.
1133.title: Ways of being Evil

info.description:
okay all my first try at an interactive
and I think I chose something I haven't seen here before
All I ask is that every chapter is in poetic form
and that you stay with the story line
use correct grammer please I won't delete if it is
not correct But I just ask you to use correct grammer
